attributes.action: petition Parliament to revoke the recent amendment to the Freedom of Information Act exempting MPs from the obligation to disclose information on demand.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This change was made without the public debate it deserves. It is against the spirit of democracy. It has the potential to destroy the confidence of both the domestic and international community in the integrity of Britain's MPs.

The Freedom of Information Act marked the end of the ability of government organisations to deceive the public they serve. Exempting the House of Commons, which once led the world in defining democracy, is a disgrace.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
